local_intent: Gate on visibility or detect t_block, move above it by 0.02 m, then verify arrival near the target.
assumptions: IsAt evaluates success when the end-effector is positioned above the t_block target frame.
coherence_with_global: Respects the global sequence: perceive t_block (with fallback scanning and retry) then MoveAbove with identical parameters, followed by a simple arrival check.
